title: Unable to purchase [item] because:
body:
my past accounts didnt have this but when i dont have enough gold or im not in shop phisicaly then it will have this anoying little popup saying 
Unable to purchase [item] because:...
I know its not a big deal but its really bothering me since i always have to click on the notification to make it go away

replies.body:
I wonder if this is actually related to some kind of config setting. We can try giving those a reset by following these steps, but please let me know if this works. If not, try to grab a screenshot from a replay of what that looked like!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
